description: Who was Corey Comperatore, the man killed in the assassination attempt at this weekend's Trump rally in Pennsylvania?
title: The man killed in the assassination attempt on Trump died shielding his family

description: The latest on what we know about the shooting at yesterday's Trump rally and the investigation into it.
title: Here's what we know so far about Trump's assassination attempt

description: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with Washington Post sports reporter Ava Wallace about the men's final that took place Sunday at Wimbledon.
title: Spain's Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic for Wimbledon men's title

description: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with photojournalist Doug Mills about the viral photograph he took of what appears to be a bullet passing by former President Donald Trump's head at yesterday's rally.
title: Photographing the assassination attempt of former President Trump

description: Ahead of the RNC, which begins Monday, how will Trump's assassination attempt affect the Republican nominating convention?
title: Milwaukee prepares for Republican convention, despite tense political moment

description: NPR's Scott Detrow discusses the match with Jeff Rueter of The Athletic.
title: Spain and England face off in Euro Cup final

description: NPR's Scott Detrow talks with presidential historian Doris Kearns Goodwin about how history can help us make sense of the attempted assassination against former President Donald Trump.
title: Can history help us understand political violence against elected officials?

description: Haley, the top rival to former President Donald Trump in the 2024 primary election, just released her delegates and encouraged them to back Trump. Now, she'll be at the convention to nominate him.
title: After saying she wouldn't be there, Nikki Haley will now speak at Republican convention

description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Bill Briggs, a political consultant who worked in advanced planning for events under Presidents George W. Bush and Donald Trump.
title: How the shooting at Trump's rally breached security at the event

description: The FBI and Pennsylvania state authorities continue to investigate what they call an attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump and the shooting of other rallygoers.
title: Multiple law enforcement agencies investigate Trump assassination attempt

description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with former FBI agent, Kenneth Gray, about the bureau’s investigation into the assassination attempt on Former President Donald Trump.
title: Former FBI agent breaks down the investigation into the shooting at former President Trump

description: We look at the political fallout resulting from the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump.
title: Unpacking the political moment of the shooting at former President Trump

description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Republican Congressman Mike Lawler of New York about yesterday's assassination attempt at former president Donald Trump's campaign rally.
title: The RNC will proceed as planned as Republican members of caucus respond to the news

description: A new lawsuit filed by record labels Universal, Sony and Warner says their catalogs have been ripped off by two AI music generators. But there’s a twist: It’s not clear the courts are on their side.
title: The music industry is coming for AI

description: The political landscape changed with a shooting at former President Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania Saturday evening leaving Americans waking up Sunday with more questions than answers.
title: Former President Donald Trump is safe after an assassination attempt at his rally

description: Last night, former President Trump was shot during a rally in Butler, Pa. The area, north of Pittsburgh, is known for it's strong support for Trump.
title: Butler County, where Trump was holding his rally, is a stronghold for his campaign

description: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump's rally yesterday, in Butler Pennsylvania.
title: Details are emerging in the assassination attempt on former President Trump

description: We'll bring you the latest on the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump. The incident took place at his campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday.
title: The latest on the assassination attempt on former President Trump

description: Cat owners in this country are exploring ways to take their feline friends outside safely for walks on leashes, in backpacks and in strollers. (Story first aired on Morning Edition on July 5, 2024.)
title: Cats on leashes ... yes, it's a thing

description: The GOP primary in Utah's largest Congressional district is too close to call, with a recount expected. A political newcomer was endorsed by Sen. Mike Lee. The incumbent was backed by Donald Trump.
title: The GOP primary in Utah's largest Congressional district is going for a recall

description: The central valley of California produces a quarter of the nation's food. How are farmworkers dealing with an intense, long-lasting heatwave sweeping the interior of the state?
title: Central Valley, where a quarter of the U.S.'s food is grown, faces extreme heat

description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with Arizona rancher Mike Gannuscio about why the number of the nation's beef cow herd are at their lowest in 63 years.
title: Beef production has fallen in recent years because of a years-long drought

description: Treason cases have been rare in Russia in the last 30 years, with a handful annually. But since the 2022 invasion of Ukraine, they have skyrocketed, along with espionage prosecutions.
title: Treason and espionage cases are rising in Russia since the war in Ukraine began

description: For decades, tianeptine was used to treat depression, even though no one knew how it worked. But it turns out it's a type of opioid, and the U.S. is facing a spike in abuse of "gas station heroin."
title: 8 things to know about the drug known as 'gas station heroin'

description: Often working with multiple video screens showing actors moving in extreme slow motion, Viola’s ruminations on fundamental human themes like grief and spirituality were immersive and hypnotic.
title: Trailblazing video artist Bill Viola dies at 73

description: Swing state voters are seeing ads warning them about a federal ban on their gas-powered vehicles. But there is no such ban, even as candidates campaign on it.
title: Biden faces criticism over his gas car ban. But he doesn’t have one.

description: The gunman, who was killed by Secret Service personnel, fired multiple times from an elevated position outside of the rally venue, about 150 yards from where Trump was speaking.
title: The Secret Service is investigating how man the who shot Trump got as close as he did

description: Former President Donald Trump says he was shot and hit by a bullet in the upper part of his right ear. Take a look at the aftermath of the shooting.
title: Photos: See how the Trump rally shooting unfolded
